subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jonathon Niese exited after six scoreless innings and a career-high 10 strikeouts as the Mets beat the Cardinals to move into a tie for first place in the National League East.
snippet: Jonathon Niese exited after six scoreless innings and a career-high 10 strikeouts as the Mets beat the Cardinals to move into a tie for first place in the National League East.
